Values: ['An excellent choice that leads to another scene.', 'The beginning of an Act. Marg will be of great use here.', 'Even a well-rehearsed script may face unexpected events.', 'A conflict is imminent. Defeat the enemies to win rewards.', 'The crossing point of different futures. <color=#FF3F3F>School abilities are limited</color>.']

['Select to gain unique School Skills that significantly boost your power.', 'Obtain this to increase the level, rating, Memory level and weapon level of all trial characters.', 'Enhances the bonuses in Behind the Curtain.', 'Increases the familiarity with Schools, unlocks more skills and provides unique buffs.']
['New content unlocked in Behind the Curtain', 'Go to Behind the Curtain']
['Assets/Product/Texture/Image/IconTools/IconTheatre07.png', 'Script', 'Increases the level, rating, Memory level and weapon level of all trial characters.']

['In opposition to conventional art schools, this school captures human perception and experience in a particular moment with light and shadow. Teaches <color=#fa5826>fire-related</color> abilities.', 'An expression of ethnic cultures. The scripts and music contain ethnic music elements. Teaches <color=#168eec>lightning-related</color> abilities.', 'Represents subject matter truthfully and scientifically. Teaches <color=#13cfb7>ice-related</color> abilities.', 'Depicts the subjective world through objective, passionate and exaggerated methods. Teaches abilities <color=#f13c3c>related to Sharp Lance</color>.', 'Expresses the eternal nature of subjects through abstract and distorting depictions of reality. Teaches abilities <color=#cc68c1>related to pulling and black hole</color>.', 'Pays tribute to the principles based in the historical cultures with emphasis on historical reference. Respects the reign of monarch. Teaches <color=#ff8d1e>energy-related</color> abilities.', 'The passionate, vibrant movements of this school laid the foundation of many culture forms in later generations. Teaches abilities <color=#8fcf06>related to levitating machines</color>.']
['Adventure Mode is on: Story nodes will be hidden. (You will not be able to complete the related ending missions in this mode.)']
['Adventure Mode is off: Story nodes will be displayed.']
